Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

Compressor Filter

Discussion

This filter "compresses" the dynamic range of a signal by making quiet signals louder and loud signals a bit quieter.

Preferences:

"Compressor Ratio": Amount of compression. Range: 0.0 to 10.0 compression ratio.

"Expand Ratio": Amount of expansion. Range: 0.0 to 4.0 % expansion ratio.

"Compressor Mix": Mix of the compressed signal. Range: 0.00 (original - dry) to 1.0 % (full compress - wet).


Group: Digital Filter Services
Related Sections: Auto-panner Filter
